name: CS2D
description: CS2D is a free fast-paced top-down multiplayer shooter. Featuring many different game modes, a built-in map editor and much more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 2000, XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 GHZ Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 64 MB 3D video card with DirectX OR OpenGL support DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL compatible audio device for voice chat
